flawed_nl_solution:
Sonja will spend $3 + $23 = $<<3+23=23>>23.
Barbara will spend 5 + ( 2 * 2) = $<<5+2*2=9>>9.

Everyone but Sonijs spend $9 + $6 + $4 = $<<9+6+4=19>>19.
Sonija spent $23 - $19 = $<<23-19=4>>4 more than the rest of the people at the party.
